version_description:
- Guns for rent! Get a gun or an armor element for rent for a while!
- Try on the whole set of armor before you purchase it. Take a look at your hero in the full set!
- Special offers with great discounts

- Updated system of VIP. Now you can buy special VIP goods for VIP points!
- New bonus "Booster of Madness" has been added. Use it to get more coins and XP for battles!
- New victory chest
- Updated interface
- improved upgrade system

- New victory chest
- Updated interface
- improved upgrade system

- Try on the whole set of armor before you purchase it. Take a look at your hero in the full set!

- Updated system of VIP. Now you can buy special VIP goods for VIP points!
- New bonus "Booster of Madness" has been added. Use it to get more coins and XP for battles!
- New victory chest
- Updated interface
- improved upgrade system

New features:
- The most long-awaited adventure mode is finally in the game! So where is Mr.Fluffy? It's time to reveal the main secret of Mad GunZ game!
- Crafting mode is here! Create your own map and fight on it!
- New "Capture point" mode is available now! Put your team together, capture points, get more scores and win!
Great news from the bank:
- New special tab in the bank! Even the most sophisticated player will find a great and suitable pack in it!
- Special winter set of armor is in the store. Put on the whole Santa's Bodyguard's set and start your battle!
Overall performance improvement, corrected bugs.

New features:
- The most long-awaited adventure mode is finally in the game! So where is Mr.Fluffy? It's time to reveal the main secret of Mad GunZ game!
- Crafting mode is here! Create your own map and fight on it!
- New "Capture point" mode is available now! Put your team together, capture points, get more scores and win!
Great news from the bank:
- New special tab in the bank! Even the most sophisticated player will find a great and suitable pack in it!
- Special winter set of armor is in the store. Put on the whole Santa's Bodyguard's set and start your battle!
Overall performance improvement, corrected bugs.

New SUPERBONUS system! It's not necessary to complete all missions in 7 days anymore! Just complete 10 missions and get your crazy prize!
Great news from the bank and Mad GunZ store!
- Special discounts and new crazy offers are waiting for you!
- Your favourite guns can be purchased for coins again!
- Fantastic price drop on Hamsteraze bombs! Hurry up to get exploding hamsters!
And nice bonus for newbies! Each player who will reach lvl 3 gets a bullet-proof jacket!
Overall performance improvement, corrected bugs.

New SUPERBONUS system! It's not necessary to complete all missions in 7 days anymore! Just complete 10 missions and get your crazy prize!
Great news from the bank and Mad GunZ store!
- Special discounts and new crazy offers are waiting for you!
- Your favourite guns can be purchased for coins again!
- Fantastic price drop on Hamsteraze bombs! Hurry up to get exploding hamsters!
And nice bonus for newbies! Each player who will reach lvl 3 gets a bullet-proof jacket!
Overall performance improvement, corrected bugs.

New map is in the game already! Explore the whole new world and take part in furiously crazy battles!
Bugs have been fixed, overall performance improvement!

We love our dear players and always hear their complaints!
-System of armor breakage has been deleted!
- "Stamina" has been deleted from the game!
- Big prize marathon has been added!
- New system of daily tasks!
- New level tasks have been added!
- Cat tournament for pro players with super crystal bonus as the reward!

Battle Royale mode is finally in the game! Huge map, lots of mad enemies and crafting mode! Try your best and become the last survivor!

- Remastered system of map crafting! Building and playing on your own map is more interesting from now!
- Tons of new building elements! From walls to houses, from decorations and furniture to cars!
- Bug fixes and overall performance improvement
